message:
Sector commandar's hortal (strike) is another victory for Islam loving people.
1. The hortal will start at Friday that is a holyday and the day of upcoming historical long march called by Hefajote Islam. It's very funny that in the world history this is first time some mental people call hortal at a holy day. As hortal is called at holiday it is clear to all except mad that it is called to stop long march of Hefajote Islam. 2. HI is protesting atheists to save Islamic values. Trying to stop HI means being against Islam and helping atheists. So it is proved that ghatok dalal nirmul committee is mainly a committee established for removing Islam from Bangladesh. Their musks have been oppened by this Hortal. 3. By the activites of ghadanik it is proved that their claims are not against Rajakars instead of Islamist leaders. And it also proved that the leaders of Jammat Islami are not war criminals but pure Islamic scholars. So brothers and sisters don't fear Hortal, just let it be.
- Nirob
